data.title: Sad, this place has gone to the kids!
data.text: Have been coming here for 3 years.  We (as a family) have really enjoyed this place.  The food has always been good but the service is just horrible.  Kids run it and it shows.  Don't ever order to go!  Have ordered by phone and on there new online program and both have been disappointing.  Wrong orders, cold food and even missing food.  When I have complained they even went as far to say come back to pick up items or we will send you a gift card.  Well the gift cards never came on two different occasions.  What a bummer this is (or was) my daughters favorite spot on Mommy/daughter dates.  They have lost my business!

data.title: Bug in salad
data.text: I pointed out an insect of some sort in my salad, and they didn't really seem to care, they just gave me a free meal card and said sorry. It was weird. I will not go back.

data.title: not a fan
data.text: My daughter loves it so I tried it with her...she loves the sweet pork nachos, I had a beef burrito, just not as good as she made it out but people have their own preferences.  Give me Rumbi anytime.

data.title: Yummy Mexican Food On the Go!
data.text: Stopped in here for a quick bite on a paragliding trip - not really fast food, but not fine dining either - casual grill is a good description - tasty, large portions, great service, all at reasonable prices!  Recommended!

data.title: Great raspberry chipotle chicken
data.text: I love eating at any of the Costa Vida locations, although this location is the closest one to my house, so I eat here the most often. They cater to the gluten-free eater and always change their gloves when you tell them you're gluten-free. Their raspberry chipotle chicken salad or tacos are my favorite, but everything here tastes great! Also, refillable sodas with limes are a plus in my book!
